results.title: What Happened, Miss Simone?
results.creator_credit: Amy Hobby, Liz Garbus, Justin Wilkes, Rebecca Luke, Markus Kirschner and RadicalMedia
results.brief_description: The film chronicles Nina Simone’s journey from child piano prodigy to iconic musician and passionate activist, told in her own words.

constellations_other.name: Assassins: real world manifestations
constellations_other.description: Ryan White’s documentary Assassins breaks down the wild true story of the assassination of North Korea’s Kim John-nam, diving into the political and personal motivations behind the event.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Amy Hobby, Liz Garbus, Justin Wilkes, Rebecca Luke, Markus Kirschner and RadicalMedia
results.description: The film chronicles Nina Simone’s journey from child piano prodigy to iconic musician and passionate activist, told in her own words.

results.title: What's Cooking?
results.headline_credit: United Kingdom and United States of America, 2000
results.brief_description: In LA’s Fairfax district, where ethnic groups abound, four households celebrate Thanksgiving amidst family tensions.

constellations_other.name: Culture, food and family
constellations_other.description: Food as a link to culture and family.

results.headline_credit_for_label: United Kingdom and United States of America, 2000
results.description: In LA’s Fairfax district, where ethnic groups abound, four households celebrate Thanksgiving amidst family tensions. In the Nguyen family, the children’s acculturation and immigrant parents’ fears collide. In the Avila family, Isabel’s son has invited her estranged husband to their family dinner. Audrey and Ron Williams want to keep their own family’s ruptures secret from Ron’s visiting mother. In the Seelig household, Herb and Ruth are unwilling to discuss openly their grown daughter’s living with her lover, Carla. Around each table, things come to a head. A gun, an affair, a boyfriend, and a pregnancy precipitate crises forcing each family to find its center.
description_for_label: In LA’s Fairfax district, where ethnic groups abound, four households celebrate Thanksgiving amidst family tensions. In the Nguyen family, the children’s acculturation and immigrant parents’ fears collide. In the Avila family, Isabel’s son has invited her estranged husband to their family dinner. Audrey and Ron Williams want to keep their own family’s ruptures secret from Ron’s visiting mother. In the Seelig household, Herb and Ruth are unwilling to discuss openly their grown daughter’s living with her lover, Carla. Around each table, things come to a head. A gun, an affair, a boyfriend, and a pregnancy precipitate crises forcing each family to find its center.

results.title: Whale Rider
results.brief_description: Whale Rider is a 2002 New Zealand-German family drama film written and directed by Niki Caro, starring Keisha Castle-Hughes as Kahu Paikea Apirana, a 12-year-old Māori girl whose ambition is to become the chief of the tribe.

constellations_other.name: Little J & Big Cuz to Blade
constellations_other.description: Discover how some of the best indigenous works connect to comic book blockbusters and martial arts videogames.

results.description: On the east coast of New Zealand, the Whangara people believe their presence there dates back a thousand years or more to a single ancestor, Paikea, who escaped death when his canoe capsized by riding to shore on the back of a whale. From then on, Whangara chiefs, always the first-born, always male, have been considered Paikea’s direct descendants. Pai, an 11-year-old girl in a patriarchal New Zealand tribe, believes she is destined to be the new chief. But her grandfather Koro is bound by tradition to pick a male leader. Pai loves Koro more than anyone in the world, but she must fight him and a thousand years of tradition to fulfill her destiny.
description_for_label: On the east coast of New Zealand, the Whangara people believe their presence there dates back a thousand years or more to a single ancestor, Paikea, who escaped death when his canoe capsized by riding to shore on the back of a whale. From then on, Whangara chiefs, always the first-born, always male, have been considered Paikea’s direct descendants. Pai, an 11-year-old girl in a patriarchal New Zealand tribe, believes she is destined to be the new chief. But her grandfather Koro is bound by tradition to pick a male leader. Pai loves Koro more than anyone in the world, but she must fight him and a thousand years of tradition to fulfill her destiny.

results.title: Westworld
results.brief_description: In a futuristic resort, wealthy patrons can visit recreations of different time periods and experience their wildest fantasies with life-like robots. But when Richard Benjamin opts for the wild west, he gets more than he bargained for when a gunslinger robot goes berserk.
results.description: In a futuristic resort, wealthy patrons can visit recreations of different time periods and experience their wildest fantasies with life-like robots. But when Richard Benjamin opts for the wild west, he gets more than he bargained for when a gunslinger robot goes berserk.

results.title: Westworld
results.brief_description: A dark odyssey about the dawn of artificial consciousness and the evolution of sin, set at the intersection of the near future and the reimagined past, Westworld explores a world in which every human appetite, noble or depraved, can be indulged.

constellations_other.name: Dream A Little Crazy: The next stage of human evolution
constellations_other.description: Collaborators Lucy McRae and Rachel Wingfield created a ‘biological bakery’ for Architecture In Helsinki’s "Dream A Little Crazy". Manufacturing a series of mass-produced band members the clip explores speculative science and the future of the human body’s evolution.

constellations_other.name: Action, emotion and videogames
constellations_other.description: More and more, videogames are beginning to favour emotion as much as action, just like their film and TV cousins.

constellations_other.name: Outlawed
constellations_other.description: From The Story of the Kelly Gang to Sweet Country, this Constellation explores bushrangers, samurai and bandits.

results.description: A dark odyssey about the dawn of artificial consciousness and the evolution of sin, set at the intersection of the near future and the reimagined past, Westworld explores a world in which every human appetite, noble or depraved, can be indulged.

video_links.name: Westworld - Official Trailer - Warner Bros. UK

results.title: Wentworth
results.brief_description: Bea Smith is locked up while awaiting trial for the attempted murder of her husband and must learn how life works in prison. A modern adaptation and sequel of the iconic Prisoner series.

constellations_other.name: Canopy
constellations_other.description: John Harvey is a Torres Strait Islander producer, director and writer in screen and stage whose work Canopy celebrates Indigenous self-representation.

constellations_other.name: Sequins and sapphires
constellations_other.description: Two of the most striking costumes on the big and small screens embody the glamour of leading First Peoples ladies.

constellations_other.name: Women and crime
constellations_other.description: The allure and fascination of dangerous women and women in danger.

results.description: Bea Smith is locked up while awaiting trial for the attempted murder of her husband and must learn how life works in prison. A modern adaptation and sequel of the iconic Prisoner series.
description_for_label: Bea Smith is locked up while awaiting trial for the attempted murder of her husband and must learn how life works in prison. A modern adaptation and sequel of the iconic Prisoner series.

results.title: Wellington Paranormal
results.brief_description: New Zealand’s capital is a hotbed of supernatural activity… so Officers Minogue and O’Leary, who featured in the vampire documentary What We Do In The Shadows, take to the streets to investigate all manner of paranormal phenomena.

constellations_other.name: Spooky shadows
constellations_other.description: Hellish and hilarious vampires connect pioneering German cinema to contemporary New Zealand comedy with a quick detour into small town strangeness.

results.description: New Zealand’s capital is a hotbed of supernatural activity… so Officers Minogue and O’Leary, who featured in the vampire documentary What We Do In The Shadows, take to the streets to investigate all manner of paranormal phenomena.

results.title: Waterworld
results.brief_description: In a futuristic world where the polar ice caps have melted and made Earth a liquid planet, a beautiful barmaid rescues a mutant seafarer from a floating island prison.

constellations_other.name: Cartoon classics and criticism
constellations_other.description: A whole cavalcade of cartoons have successfully made the leap into arcades and onto consoles, but the relationship between cinema and videogames is far more likely to fizzle out.

results.description: In a futuristic world where the polar ice caps have melted and made Earth a liquid planet, a beautiful barmaid rescues a mutant seafarer from a floating island prison. They escape, along with her young charge, Enola, and sail off aboard his ship.
description_for_label: In a futuristic world where the polar ice caps have melted and made Earth a liquid planet, a beautiful barmaid rescues a mutant seafarer from a floating island prison. They escape, along with her young charge, Enola, and sail off aboard his ship.

results.title: Water for Elephants
results.brief_description: In this captivating Depression-era melodrama, impetuous veterinary student Jacob Jankowski joins a celebrated circus as an animal caretaker but faces a wrenching dilemma when he’s transfixed by angelic married performer Marlena.
results.description: In this captivating Depression-era melodrama, impetuous veterinary student Jacob Jankowski joins a celebrated circus as an animal caretaker but faces a wrenching dilemma when he’s transfixed by angelic married performer Marlena.

results.title: WarGames
results.brief_description: David Lightman has a talent for hacking. But while trying to hack into a computer system to play unreleased video games, he unwittingly taps into the Defense Department’s war computer and initiates a confrontation of global proportions!

constellations_other.name: Hack the planet
constellations_other.description: How do you represent something that's... kinda boring to look at, like hacking, when you're operating in a visual medium like film, TV and videogames?

results.description: High School student David Lightman has a talent for hacking. But while trying to hack into a computer system to play unreleased video games, he unwittingly taps into the Defense Department’s war computer and initiates a confrontation of global proportions. Together with his girlfriend and a wizardly computer genius, David must race against time to outwit his opponent and prevent a nuclear Armageddon.
description_for_label: High School student David Lightman has a talent for hacking. But while trying to hack into a computer system to play unreleased video games, he unwittingly taps into the Defense Department’s war computer and initiates a confrontation of global proportions. Together with his girlfriend and a wizardly computer genius, David must race against time to outwit his opponent and prevent a nuclear Armageddon.
